snippet: A Paris judge said Thursday that she will decide Friday whether an auction that day of Hopi Indian artifacts can proceed despite complaints from the tribe.
abstract: A Paris judge said Thursday that she will decide Friday whether an auction that day of Hopi Indian artifacts can proceed despite complaints from the tribe.

headline.main: Paris Judge to Rule Friday on Hopi Artifact Sale
headline.print_headline: French Judge to Rule Friday On Selling Hopi Artifacts
